title: Owning the room
author: VD
content_html: Simon Evans is awesome. “My accent may be rather unfamiliar, possibly even rather exotic to some of you. If you are struggling to place it, it is, in fact, educated.”
content_text: Simon Evans is awesome.  “My accent may be rather unfamiliar, possibly even rather exotic to some of you.  If you are struggling to place it, it is, in fact, educated.”
